mapper.select: SELECT res.resnum, res.id, res.regdate, res.content, res.subnum, res.step, res.depth FROM (select rownum r, re.* from RESPONSE re where subnum=#{subnum}) res WHERE res.r between #{startRow} and #{endRow} order by step asc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESPONSE where subnum=#{subnum}
select Max(step) from response where subnum=#{subnum}
select * from response where subnum=#{subnum} and step >= #{step} and depth > #{depth} or resnum=#{resnum}
mapper.update: update response set step = step+1 where (subnum = #{subnum}) and (step >= #{step})
UPDATE RESPONSE SET CONTENT=#{content} where resnum = #{resnum}
